entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 in the afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
